news.title: Chennai: Consent not needed to scrap power of attorney issued by property owners
news.para: The order, however, will not apply to 'power with consideration' agreements containing clauses on monetary transaction between landlords and agents as approval is required from both the parties to declare such PoAs null and void.

news.title: HC notice to UoI, Delhi govt on plea by families for allotment of flats under rehabilitation scheme
news.para: The petition said these 61 petitioners and their families were illegally evicted from Gol Market in Central Delhi in 2010 and in compliance with an October 2011 order of the authorities, they are staying at a community centre which is a shelter home and awaiting rehabilitation.

news.title: Noida authority installs 20,000 LED lights across 61 villages
news.para: Some of the villages that have benefited from these lights and development works include Morna, Nithari, Aghapur, Parthala, Sorkha, Hoshiyarpur, Mamura, Gejha amon others.

news.title: Gujarat HC seeks government plan to enforce fire safety rules in phases
news.para: The HC was hearing the PIL filed by petitioner-advocate Amit Panchal, demanding proper implementation of the Fire Safety Act and full compliance with directions issued by the court over the last two decades.

news.title: BIS raids company for selling cement without hallmark in Telangana
news.para: On a tip-off, BIS team conducted raids and found that it was manufacturing 53-Grade ordinary Portland cement without the BIS hallmark.

news.title: Gurugram: Construction ban leaves daily wagers without an income
news.para: While a section has supported the National Campaign Committee for Central Legislation on Construction Labour that has moved the SC against the order and sought ex gratia for workers, others find it too time-consuming and want an “instant solution”.

news.title: Govt buildings are major defaulters in Thiruvananthapuram corporation's tax dues list
news.para: Cash strapped Thiruvananthapuram Development Authority (TRIDA) seems to top the tax defaulter list. TRIDA’s due to corporation for a single building in Palayam is Rs 1.58 crores.

news.title: Property prices in Goa set to rise by 10-15%, says Credai
news.para: Credai-Goa said failure to tackle the skyrocketing prices will push the state’s real estate prices by at least 10-15% in the near term.

news.title: Thane civic body passes resolution to waive property tax of houses up to 500 sq ft
news.para: ​The resolution was passed during the general body meeting of the civic body held on Thursday, where the members were present in-person. Mayor Naresh Mhaske presided over the meeting.

news.title: Indore: Now, homebuyers in a fix as building costs go up
news.para: Builders said cost of construction has jumped by atleast Rs 300 per sq ft amid a sharp increase in prices of steel, cement, pipes, iron and fuel.

news.title: Andhra Pradesh: Construction sites fall silent after input prices skyrocket
news.para: The non-availability of sand, in particular, has slowed down construction activity. Sand is usually sold for Rs 350 per metric tonne at sand reaches.

news.title: To get CC, builders must repair roads: West Bengal CM
news.para: ​​I would ask officials to conduct an on-site survey and see that the developer undertakes road repairs before issuing the completion certificate for the building,” the CM said.

news.title: EESL to partner energy service firms to scale up Building Energy Efficiency Programme
news.para: Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL) said "it is developing business models for collaborating with private sector Energy Service Companies (ESCOs) and broadening its service offerings in the BEEP, in view of the huge market potential in the country."

news.title: Smart City Mission: 28 states, UTs fail to release share of funds for smart cities
news.para: Smart City Mission, which was launched in June 2015, involves developing 100 smart and sustainable cities. This involves a 50:50 financing model with the Centre contributing Rs 500 crore and the state giving an equal share for five years.

news.title: Noida & Greater Noida authorities issues penalties for violation of pollution norms
news.para: GNIDA CEO Narendra Bhooshan has appealed to city residents to support in tackling pollution by not burning waste, increasing plantation and ensuring proper waste management.
